label: Johns Further Questions 11
description:
Hubert tells John he was in a flying train due to the "Quicksilver" which is a magical ore that makes inanimate objects levitate and facilitates other modern conveniences.  Tourists always step into a flying train if one is running to first start off their vacation.  Hubert also states lately there aren't many trains running due to the troubles.

Hit 1 to continue.

Hit 0 to quit.
